articles.title: Congratulations to President of Congo
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Congo
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Denis Sassou-Nguesso upon his reelection as President of Congo.
					Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Congo would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, Kim in the message sincerely wished the Congolese president good health and happiness and greater success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Mongolian Guest Here
articles.content:
Mongolian Guest Here
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolia Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, arrived here today by train.

articles.title: Solar Eclipse to Be Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Solar Eclipse to Be Observed in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The world will see a total solar eclipse on July 22.
					 The DPRK will observe a partial eclipse expected to begin from about 9:35 a.m. 
					
					At 10:46 a.m. a maximum of about 60-70% of the sun is expected to swing into the cone of shadow cast by the moon. It is expected to end at around 12:02.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in War Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in War Marked
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting with Hero of the Republic Pak Chan Su, lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, was held at the Women's Hall Tuesday on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea at the meeting with the hero recollected the days of the war during which the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressors under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung, exalting the dignity of the country. 
					
					 Pak recalled that the officers and men of the Korean People's Army wiped out the U.S. imperialists and their stooges in the war they ignited in a bid to stifle the young Republic in its cradle, thus honorably defending the country and revolutionary gains.
					
					 Kim Il Sung went as far as the forefront, indicating unique war methods and taking deep care of the living of the soldiers, the hero noted, adding that his warm love served as a source of strength that encouraged them to display unrivaled courage in every battle. 
					
					 Pointing out that the army and people of the DPRK could achieve shining victory as they fought, guided by the outstanding military thought and unique Juche-oriented war methods indicated by the Supreme Commander, the hero declared the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieving national reunification would be sure to be accomplished thanks to the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He sang the song "My Song in the Trench" together with members of the union. 
					
					 There was a performance by members of the art squad of the Central Committee of the union. 
					
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Beautiful Native Place", duet "The General Is Marksman and We Are Direct Hits" and solo "Peace Has Been Preserved by Our Army."

articles.title: Russian Diplomats Visit Museum and Historic Site
articles.content:
Russian Diplomats Visit Museum and Historic Site
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires ad Interim Alexander Matsegora and staff members of the Russian embassy here visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum and the Historic Site Associated with the Fatherland Liberation War on Tuesday on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					In front of the mosaic portraying President Kim Il Sung at the museum, they paid tribute to him who led the Fatherland Liberation War to brilliant victory.
					
					Then, they went round office rooms, tunnel and other places, being briefed on the fact that the President guided the work of various sectors including the Cabinet and the Military Commission while staying there during the war.
					
					They also visited the Historic Site Associated with the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to those intellectuals who have made big contributions to the scientific research and education of rising generations, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					The title of academician was conferred on Hong So Hon, president of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and professorship on Jon Il Ho, director of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Choe Sun Bong, room chief of the Mathematic Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, Son Kyong Nam, chief of the Biological Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Kyong Hak, dean of a faculty of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, and others.
					
					Also doctorate was awarded to Ri Pyong Gan, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hui Chol, a teacher of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Yang Song Ho, dean of a faculty of Korea University of Physical Education, Kim Jong Bong, chief of a department of Kanggye University of Education No. 1, Kim Tong Gi, a former unconverted long-term prisoner, and others and associate professorship to 53 persons.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place on Tuesday.

articles.title: Brisk Water Sports Activities
articles.content:
Brisk Water Sports Activities
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK, a maritime country, has set July and August as months for water sports activities. In the months maritime physical culture and sports activities are being conducted in an intensive way.
					Educational institutions are intensifying swimming lessons and extracurricular swimming activities.
					
					In the current period for water sports Pyongyang City has taken measures to supply water preferentially to the school swimming pools and is exerting efforts to swimming lessons for students at the already built swimming pools in different parts of the city.
					
					Swimming contests are being widely held in Kangwon, North Phyongan, South Hamgyong and other provinces, cities and counties. Colorful maritime physical culture activities including the work of judging swimming ability of teachers and students according to their ages are getting brisk.
					
					Meanwhile, swimming is encouraged in the country. All the necessary conditions are provided so the working people may take part in water sports activities without exception.
					
					Amid the care of the government, the Majon recreation resort and the Songdowon sea-bathing resort have been renewed beyond recognition and the Sariwon open-air swimming pool has been built to improve the general conditions for water sports activities and raise the enthusiasm of the masses.
					
					The swimming pools, sea beaches and rivers are crowded with working people and school youth and children these days.

articles.title: Sariwon Art College
articles.content:
Sariwon Art College
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- There are many schools for rearing a great number of talented artiste reserves in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Among them is Sariwon Art College.
					
					 Over the last 30-odd years since it was founded on November 5, Juche 64 (1975), the college has directed particular concern to instruction and edification for cultivating the musical art talent of the students in accordance with the principle of socialist pedagogy and the characteristics of art education.
					
					 It has made valuable reference books and 12,000-odd pieces of visual aids and teaching aids for education.
					
					 Many students of the college won prizes in the individual contests for February 16 art prize and the national sketch festivals celebrating February 16.
					
					 The graduates of Sariwon Art College are active in influential art troupes and art studios including the State Merited Chorus, Phibada Opera Troupe, State Folk Art Troupe and Mansudae Art Studio.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Nuclear Hysteria Flailed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Nuclear Hysteria Flailed
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Former Vice-President of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan Yamasaki in a recent seminar in Tokyo Metropolis blustered that "when the two countries of Japan and the U.S. deem it necessary to let a warship carrying nuclear weapons call on a port of Japan for the peace and security of Japan and the rest of Far East, they should allow it to do so."
					His claim calls for reexamining the "three non-nuclear principles" which ban Japan from possessing, producing or allowing nuclear weapons on its territory and scrapping article which "bans shipment" of them there and thus allowing U.S.-flagged warships carrying nuclear weapons to enter ports of Japan and their transit through its territorial waters.
					
					Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday observes:
					
					This is an evident revelation of Japan's intention to throw away the "three non-nuclear principles" which it has so far advertised as a clear indication of its "will for opposition to nukes."
					
					The aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries in touting the above-said principles is to use them as a good smokescreen and speed up the nuclear weaponization in real earnest under it and divert elsewhere the international community's criticism of them.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries have discarded even the veil of the "three non-nuclear principles" which they have put on for form's sake so far and disclosed their scenario to openly go nuclear, the news analyst notes, and goes on: 
					
					As well known to everybody, the Japanese reactionaries are keen to exact revenge for Japan's defeat in the war and have their grudge against the nuclear holocaust it suffered settled and seized with the wild ambition for reinvasion. Clear is what will happen if they are allowed to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					Japan's nuclear ambition is bound to lead to gravely threatening peace and security of the world.
					
					Japan is sadly mistaken if it calculates nuclear weapons will guarantee its future. Japan should bear this deep in mind.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries had better immediately stop their reckless nuclear racket.

articles.title: Japan's Theory of "Preemptive Attack" Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Theory of "Preemptive Attack" Blasted
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries do not bother to let loose reckless remarks advocating the theory of "preemptive attack." They betray the true colors of the militarists who regard a war for overseas expansion as a means for existence and their wild ambition to exact revenge for a shameful defeat Japan suffered in the war of continental aggression in the first half of the last century.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					This reveals the Japanese reactionaries' dangerous scenario to ignite a war of aggression through a preemptive attack on the basis of the completed military preparations for reinvasion, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					Their much publicized theory of "preemptive attack" is little short of an official declaration that they have embarked upon the road of aggression.
					
					The above-said theory is sparking off a new arms race in Asia.
					
					Their moves are a blatant challenge to the desire of humankind for peace and its historic onward movement as they are rushing headlong into aggression and war, swimming against the trend of the times towards peace. The theory is stripping bare the nature of the Japanese militarists as aggressors, increasing the danger of war in Asia.
					
					Their theory of "preemptive attack" amounts to outbursts calling for a war and aggression against the DPRK.
					
					They seek to start aggression against the DPRK through preemptive attacks on its strategic bases under the pretext of "security of Japan," raising a hue and cry over the non-existent "military threat" from the DPRK.
					
					Aggression and war would bring Japan nothing but shame and destruction. The Japanese militarist forces would be well advised to drop their adventurous scenario for preemptive attack, concludes the article.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Display National Self-Esteem
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Display National Self-Esteem
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- All compatriots at home and abroad should wage a dynamic struggle for the independent development of the nation and its reunification and prosperity with high pride and self-esteem that the Korean nation is the greatest in the world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The Koreans are proud of national self-esteem and characterized by unshakable pride and honor, the article notes, and goes on;
					
					The Koreans are the most dignified nation as they hold in high esteem the greatest persons in human history. They are so resourceful, brave and talented that they have created brilliant culture and history for thousands of years. They have pride and self-esteem that there is nothing impossible for them, should they pool their will and efforts and are filled with the faith and will to build a reunified and rich and powerful country on this land come what may. 
					
					 This national self-esteem cherished by the members of the nation is more precious than anything else. It serves as an ideological and moral engine injecting life and energy into all Koreans and reinforcing their faith and will and giving strong impetus to the struggle for carving out the destiny of independent human beings and a powerful driving force speeding up the triumphant advance of the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					The Koreans' national pride and self-esteem have grown stronger as they hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il respected by the whole world.
					
					 They are the peerlessly great men recognized by the world political circle. They have been acclaimed by the Korean nation for the first time in its history spanning thousands of years. 
					
					 Whoever with high national self-esteem will glorify his or her life as a patriot in the struggle for national reunification whereas whoever keen on sycophancy and submission to others without an iota of self-esteem is bound to become a traitor to be cursed and denounced by the nation and judged by history.

articles.title: Stop to Unpopular Rule Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Unpopular Rule Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea called a press conference on July 17 in Seoul, protesting against the moves of traitor Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" against democracy.
					Speakers at the conference disclosed that the Lee Myung Bak group has not only violated freedom of expression through Internet and rallies but also controlled media by mobilizing prosecution.
					
					They charged that the Lee group is stifling human rights and freedom while engaging itself only in such unpopular policies as the "improvement of four large rivers" and enactment of an evil law on media that meet its interests only, regardless of the population's will.
					
					They urged Lee Myung Bak and the GNP to drop all sorts of unpopular policies at once.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Crackdown upon Students Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Crackdown upon Students Flayed
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea issued a statement denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its crackdown upon students on July 16.
					The statement accused the police authorities of taking away Ri Won Gi, chairman of the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, on July 15 from the venue of the press conference called in demand of the reduction of the university registration fee.
					
					This is an indication that the suppression of the present "government" has reached its height, it added. 
					
					The statement lambasted the police for perpetrating violence against the students protesting against the arrest of Ri Won Gi and spraying even liquid tear gas at them.
					
					The statement urged the Lee "government" not to brutally suppress the students but pay attention to their urgent call and immediately stop the fascist crackdown upon the above-said federation.

articles.title: Punishment of Prime Mover of Murder of Ryongsan Evacuees Demanded
articles.content:
Punishment of Prime Mover of Murder of Ryongsan Evacuees Demanded
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Catholic Priests' Association for Justice issued a statement on July 16 demanding the Lee Myung Bak group make an apology for the Ryongsan tragedy and punish the prime mover of the murder of evacuees.
					The statement said: It is half a year since evacuees in Ryongsan were killed owing to the brutal outrage of the Lee group but the authorities have so far paid no heed even to the minimum demand of the bereaved families.
					
					The prosecution and the police are working hard to cover up the truth behind tragedy in Ryongsan at any cost, still refusing to open to the public the records of the investigation into the Ryongsan tragedy.
					
					Such inhuman attitude of the Lee regime goes to prove once again the cause of man-killing.
					
					If the authorities' brutal murder is tolerated, this will cause more social misfortunes of all hues to occur, it noted, declaring that the organization will carry on the struggle till the Ryongsan tragedy is properly settled.

articles.title: Lee's Unreasonable Policy for Handling Personnel Affair Flailed
articles.content:
Lee's Unreasonable Policy for Handling Personnel Affair Flailed
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Members of human rights organizations in south Korea called a press conference on July 16 in Seoul to condemn the Lee Myung Bak group for its unreasonable policy for handling a personnel affair.
					Speakers at the press conference asserted that the person informally designated by Lee Myung Bak as chairman of the "Human Rights Committee" is not a right person for the job as he has no career as a human rights activist.
					
					It is obviously an act of infringing upon human rights that the authorities try to appoint only those obedient to them to official posts, they held, adding:
					
					The post of chairman of the committee should be held by the person who strives to guarantee people human rights rather than the one chosen by a few persons of "Chongwadae" in a secret room.
					
					The authorities would be well advised to retract the above-said action and lend an ear to the voices of people from all walks of life including the human rights organizations.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Urged to Step Down
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Urged to Step Down
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The leader of the August 15 grand march team for reunification who is vice-chairman of the general student council of Chosun University of south Korea made public an appeal on July 17 calling on the youth and students to take the lead in the struggle to bring down traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					Noting that the present regime has already been forsaken by the people, the appeal denounced the present ruling forces for persistently enforcing such unpopular laws and policies as the "law on part-time job" and the policy for "improving four large rivers".
					
					The appeal said: The present regime is now going mad with confrontation with the DPRK after totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. It is kicking up a repressive atmosphere by frantically suppressing the organizations for progress and reunification by invoking the "National Security Law."
					
					A war atmosphere is mounting on the Korean Peninsula due to the Lee Myung Bak group's anti-DPRK moves.
					
					Recalling that people are forming a front of the struggle against Lee Myung Bak and dictatorship through solidarity and unity, the appeal called upon the youth and students to go among the people and motivate them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded in Various Countries
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting, lectures, round-table talks and a film show took place in Indonesia, Guinea and Romania from July 3 to 7 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					Ristiyanto, chairman of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, said at the remembrance meeting that the immortal exploits performed by the President for the prosperity of the Korean people and the human cause of independence would remain long in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, stressed in his lecture that the President defined the U.S. imperialists as the main target of the struggle for global independence and gave perfect answers to all theoretical and practical matters arising in advancing the movement for global independence, including the matters of resolutely fighting against the imperialist forces through firm unity of all the anti-imperialist independent forces and abolishing the outdated international economic order and establishing a new one.
					
					Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, noted in his lecture that the President devoted all his life to building the country where the people are masters of the state and society and everything of society serves for the popular masses. The Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by the President would shine forever with his august name, the speaker said.
					
					The chairman of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association said at the round-table talks that the President is the benevolent liberator of the Korean nation and the tender-hearted father of people as he liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' occupation and built the socialist system centered on the popular masses in the country. He is also the leader of the world revolution who dedicated his all to the human cause of independence, the speaker added.
					
					Appreciated at the film show was the Korean film of the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK Policy Rebuked
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK Policy Rebuked
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Personages of New Zealand and Guinea issued statements in denunciation of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					Don Borrie, chairman of the New Zealand-DPRK Society, in his statement on July 9 said that peace has not yet come to the Korean Peninsula although the war was over there. The main obstacle to ensuring peace in the peninsula is the U.S. troops stationed in south Korea, he pointed out.
					
					He held that the U.S. forces should be withdrawn from south Korea in order to realize the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, in his statement on July 11 referred to the fact that the U.S. launched the most barbaric and destructive war of aggression on the DPRK on June 25, 1950, in a purpose to realize its domination over the whole of Korea.
					
					The U.S. instigated the United Nations Security Council to adopt a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its second nuclear test in another attempt to stifle the Korean people, he said, demanding that the rulers of the U.S. not forget the lesson of history.

articles.title: Park of Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Park of Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the construction site of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on a day of September, Juche 68 (1979).
					 After looking round the inside of the hospital, he commanded a bird's-eye view of the surrounding places on a balcony. Then he pointed his finger at a place in front of the hospital and instructed officials that the area should be built up as a park.
					
					 Officials gave a dubious look.
					
					 As for the place, it was planned to construct important buildings there and the ground-making project made a fair progress.
					
					 Entering into their feelings, he said to the following effect: As our people feel shy much as yet, husbands would not present bouquets to their wives before the eyes of others. A thickly-wooded park, therefore, should be laid out so that they may enjoy happy time, husbands giving bunches of flowers to their wives and holding newborn babies in arms out of sight.
					
					So, the park of love, which even young couples had not an idea of, came into being in front of the hospital.

articles.title: Se dinamizan en Corea actividades deportivas nauticas
articles.content:
Se dinamizan en Corea actividades deportivas nauticas
 Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- Conforme a las caracteristicas del pais nautico, en Corea se dinamizan los deportes nauticos en julio y agosto fijados como la temporada de los mismos.
					 Sobre todo, los organos docentes organizan sustancialmente la educacion de la natacion y la practica de esta disciplina en horas extraescolares.
					
					 En la temporada de deportes nauticos de este ano, las escuelas de esta capital utilizan en la educacion de la natacion sus piscinas interiores y las otras construidas por doquier.
					
					 Mientras tanto, en las provincias, las ciudades y los distritos incluyendo la provincia de Kangwon, la de Phyong-an del Norte y la de Hamgyong del Sur se organizan muchas competencias de natacion y la calificacion de la capacidad de nadar de los profesores, empleados y alumnos segun sus edades.
					
					 Por otra parte, en el ambito social se promueve mucho la natacion y se facilitan las condiciones para que todos los trabajadores puedan asistir a las actividades deportivas nauticas.
					
					 Efectivamente, se redoblo el entusiasmo de los habitantes gracias al mejoramiento de las condiciones generales del pais como la rehabilitacion magnifica bajo la atencion estatal del Jardin de Recreo de Majon, la Playa de Songdowon y la piscina al aire libre de Sariwon.
					
					 Ahora, las piscinas, las playas y los rios azules a lo largo del pais estan llenos de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares practicando los deportes nauticos.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia la ambicion nuclear de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la ambicion nuclear de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- "Cuando Japon y Estados Unidos consideren necesario el anclaje de un buque nuclear en Japon para la paz y la seguridad de este y el Extremo Oriente, hay que autorizarlo", insistio asi el ex vicepresidente del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon, Yamasaki, en un seminario recien efectuado en la metropoli de Tokio.
					Esto quiere decir que se debe autorizar el arribo a Japon y el paso por sus aguas maritimas jurisdiccionales de los buques estadounidenses provistos de armas nucleares al revisar los "Tres principios de desnuclearizacion" que prohiben la fabricacion, la posesion y la introduccion de armas nucleares, especificamente, tachar este ultimo acapite.
					
					Senala asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado este martes y continua:
					
					Tal discurso de Yamasaki parte de la intencion de abandonar los "Tres principios de desnuclearizacion" descritos tanto por Japon como muestra directa de su "voluntad antinuclear".
					
					Hasta la fecha, los reaccionarios japoneses vinieron levantando el cartel de esos principios con el fin de acelerar por detras en etapa crucial el armamento nuclear y desviar la mirada de vigilancia de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					Y ahora quieren invalidar esos principios, que son nominales ya de por si, e impulsar el armamento nuclear de manera abierta.
					
					 Los reaccionarios japoneses juran desquitarse de su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial y de sus perdidas por el primer uso de armas nucleares y estan ansiosos por lanzar la nueva agresion.
					
					Entonces todos se daran cuenta de lo que significaria la posesion de esos artefactos por parte de aquellos. 
					
					La ambicion nuclear de Japon es un crimen que amenaza gravemente la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Japon debe parar ahora mismo su inutil armamentismo nuclear teniendo presente que el arma nuclear no le va a asegurar nunca su futuro.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta teoria de "ataque anticipado" de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta teoria de "ataque anticipado" de Japon
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este martes critica la teoria del "ataque anticipado" de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					Insiste en que en sus tonterias venenosas estan  contenidos la naturaleza militarista cuyo modo de existencia es la guerra para la expansion a ultramar y la venganza de su derrota vergonzosa sufrida en la guerra de agresion al continente en la primera mitad del siglo pasado.
					
					Eso es una prueba de la ambicion siniestra de los reaccionarios japoneses tendentes a desatar una guerra de agresion con el ataque preventivo a base de haber perfeccionado los preparativos militares para la nueva agresion, subraya el articulista y continua:
					
					La preconizacion de la teoria del "ataque anticipado" de los reaccionarios japoneses significa que estos toman abiertamente el camino para la agresion a ultramar ante el mundo.
					
					Y esta doctrina sirve de una mecha de la nueva carrera armamentista en Asia.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses corren por la senda de agresion y guerra a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca por la defensa de la paz. Estas maniobras constituyen un abierto desafio a la aspiracion de la humanidad a la paz y el avance de la historia. 
					
					A traves de la abogacion del "ataque anticipado" los militaristas japoneses ponen al desnudo aun mas su naturaleza agresiva, debido a lo cual se aumenta en Asia la peligrosidad de la guerra.
					
					Esta teoria de los reaccionarios insulares es la palabra dura de guerra y la doctrina de agresion, contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.           Bajo el pretexto de la "seguridad" del Japon desde la supuesta "amenaza militar" de aquella, estos japoneses tratan desencadenar la nueva agresion a Corea valiendose del ataque preventivo contra las bases estrategicas de Corea.
					
					La agresion y la guerra llevaran al Japon solo a la verguenza y la ruina. Las fuerzas militaristas japonesas deben abstenerse del intento de aventurero ataque anticipado que acelerara su autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a mantener alta dignidad nacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a mantener alta dignidad nacional
 Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- Todos los coreanos deben luchar energicamente por el desarrollo independiente, la reunificacion y la prosperidad de su nacion enorgulleciendose mucho de que esta es la mejor y mas grandiosa del mundo.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 21 y continua:
					
					 Nosotros, los coreanos tenemos la dignidad nacional de que nos jactamos a todo el mundo y un orgullo que nadie puede quitarnos de ninguna manera.
					
					 La coreana es la nacion mas digna, que cuenta con los grandes hombres sin pares en la historia de humanidad, y la mas inteligente, valiente y talentosa que vino creando su brillante cultura e historia durante largo tiempo.
					
					 El orgullo y la dignidad de ella se enraizan en su fuerte conviccion de que nada es imposible si los coreanos unen sus voluntades y fuerzas y de que estos construiran sin falta una patria reunificada y prospera acabando con la division nacional.
					
					 Esta dignidad arraigada profundamente en el corazon de los miembros de la nacion es lo mas precioso que les hace redoblar el vigor, la vitalidad la fe y la voluntad.
					
					 Asimismo, funciona como el motor ideo-espiritual que impulsa energicamente la lucha por la forja del destino independiente y el avance victorioso de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
					
					 Hoy dia, tal dignidad nacional se hace mas fuerte porque parte del orgullo de enaltecer al gran lider y al gran dirigente respetados por todo el mundo.
					
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente         Kim Jong Il, excelentes lideres a que la nacion coreana acogio por primera vez en su historia de varios milenios, son los grandes hombres sin pares reconocidos por el circulo politico mundial.
					
					 En la epoca actual, los hombres con fuerte dignidad nacional viviran como patriotas en la lucha por la reunificacion de la patria y los elementos carentes de ella, enloquecidos por el servilismo y la sumision a las grandes potencias, se convertiran sin falta en los vendepatrias que serian enjuiciados por la historia sometidos a las maldiciones y condenas de los compatriotas.
